export.title: Export data
export.valid_data: Before launching the exportation you need to validate your data. They will be display  in this very frame. If you need to perform any modification please go back to the previous stages
export.export_intro: Click on the "Export data" button to export your data to a pdf file
export.no_input: One or several inputs are missing please process the previous steps
export.inputs: Using the set of points provided in "{}", the process will export the "{}" data using the "{}" bands
export.no_valid: Please verify you're input before launching the export process
txt: The module will export the required images from the driver you selected. This images will be gathered by year to produce pdf files of clip time-series. This pdf files will be merged in one single file that will be the output of the process.
Keep in mind that the size of the images can be sensible (in particular for planet data). Use an appropiate instance to be able to build your file
By the end of the process, only the pdf final file will remain in your folders, avoiding to overload your SEPAL quota.

viz.title: set up your inputs
viz.intro: Select sources and bands to be displayed
viz.bands: select the band to be displayed
viz.no_pts: No points of observation are registered. Please go back to step 1
viz.no_bands: Please provide a the bands you want to observe on your images
viz.sentinel_disabled: The processing of the sentinel 2 images provide lots of blanks areas at the moment. we strongly suggest to only use landsat 7 images
viz.disclaimer: The bands displayed in this preview have not been stretched. The exporting process will vastly improve the contrats
viz.wrong_date: Start year cannot be higher than end year
viz.no_driver: No dirver has been provided, please choose between GEE and Planet
viz.no_key: you are using the planet driver, please provide an API key
viz.no_semester: Please proved a semester to display

table.title: Select a file
table.intro: Select the table in your sepal folders
table.wrong_headers: The header of the file are not well diplayed
table.col_intro: Select the columns associated with the 3 key informations
table.read_columns: The dropdown have been updated with the header of your file : [{}]
table.missing_input: One of the column is unknown
table.reapeated_input: One of the input have been repeated. Each column must be different

test.txt: By clicking on the following btn you'll download a test dataset of points. This file will be downloaded to your SEPAL `~/downloads` folder.
test.title: Download test data File
test.msg: The test dataset have been downloaded. It will be available in the "{}/{}.csv" folder of your sepal account.

planet.invalid_key: The current key is invalid, please provide a valid Planet key
planet.test_key: We are currently checking your API key
